content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.50 > Section 82.50.435 82.50.425 << 82.50.435 >> 82.50.440 PDF RCW 82.50.435 Appeal of valuation. If the department determines a value for a travel trailer or camper under RCW 82.50.425 equivalent to a manufacturer's base suggested retail price, any person who pays the tax for that travel trailer or camper may appeal the valuation to the department under chapter 34.05 RCW. If the taxpayer is successful on appeal, the department shall refund the excess tax in the manner provided in RCW 82.50.170 . [ 1990 c 42 s 324 .] NOTES: Reviser's note: See note following RCW 82.50.010 . Purpose — Effective dates — Application — Implementation — 1990 c 42: See notes following RCW 46.68.090 .
